author: timbeiko
content: <@850444312596185089> happy to discuss here - the overall idea is that people often complain that tracking the current ETH supply is hard. A few projects exist which do it, but AIUI they only focus on one layer (e.g. only Geth or only Prysm may support it), and it's unclear if they work across client. The goal would be to be able to plug in any pair of EL/CL client, and retrieve the current supply from them (and have them agree).
